cu.explanation_en: Setting the tracking area code to a negative value will cause configuration validation failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting downlink carrier bandwidth to 300 PRBs exceeds the maximum allowed bandwidth, causing cell configuration failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行載波頻寬設定為 300 PRB 超過允許的最大頻寬，會導致小區配置失敗。
